messages.msgSnippet: Thanks a lot Secretary/Wounds... I ll try to be there... Hey, Misao! So you are too from Argentina?! Wow! @-@... It s good to know I m not alone *grins* Firuze
messages.messageBody:
Thanks a lot Secretary/Wounds... I'll try to be there...
Hey, Misao! So you are too from Argentina?! Wow! @-@... It's good to know I'm not alone *grins*

Firuze
----- Original Message -----
From: Yesi
To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 2004 9:44 PM
Subject: Re: [SHQ] Chat?Byakkotai+Yamaguchi J.+Fujita G. fam tree


I love those times!! and it would be great if I wouldn't have a birthday party u_u So, thanks Secretary, you even bothered to look for the time in Argentina, thanks, but I won't be able to chat that night. Have fun, don't get drunk, behave n_~

Misao

messages.messageBody:
Okay, I would like to propose a time...
Friday May 21, 2004
East Stand. Time (New York) 9:00 pm
Central Stand. Time (Chicago) 8:00 pm
Pacific Stand. Time (Los Angeles) 6:00 pm
Argentina (Buenos Aires) 10:00 pm

*the date/times are just a suggestions and based on info I have from
members...
(we can meet in http://www.shinsengumimb.com live chat (top left hand
under banner) but then you have to an ezboard member...it worked okay
last night but it was my computer/modem that messed up I believe and
not always Okita's ghost)
*everyone should bring a virtual hors d'oeuvres or drinks okay :D
----------------------------------------------
3-hajime.com poster discusses a movie on the Byakkotai and Yamaguchi
Jiro (SAitou Hajime) was shown in the film...note how the poster
mentions "braided talk" or an oral history concerning the
Byakkotai...I wanted to ask 3-hajime.com info on the TV series but one
poster had already mentioned that my posts are too confusing to read :(

BABELFISH:
"With around the parents' home, perhaps, that you say, also handing
down and the like regarding the survivor party loyal retainer of white
tiger party has been transmitted the variety, don't you think?. "White
tiger party" of end of year period adventure drama special, I saw.
When 2 3 years ago you borrowed video from the friend, seeing, Saito
one (Jiro Yamaguchi) there is the memory which thinks that it does not
come out completely regrettably."
